languages.text: "Ответная реакция — приемлемая. Если ты, мон-кай, будешь вести себя как хороший образец, в перспективе ты даже можешь рассчитывать на мою помощь в побеге из Комморры".
"The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."
languages.original_text: "Ответная реакция — приемлемая. Если ты, мон-кай, будешь вести себя как хороший образец, в перспективе ты даже можешь рассчитывать на мою помощь в побеге из Комморры".

traits.locale_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you might eventually come to expect my assistance in your escape from Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you might eventually come to expect my assistance in your escape from Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « C'est une réponse acceptable. Si vous vous comportez comme un bon spécimen, mon-keigh, je vous aiderai un jour à fuir Commorragh. »
languages.original_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une réponse acceptable. Si vous vous comportez comme un bon spécimen, mon-keigh, je vous aiderai un jour à fuir Commorragh. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “这样的回答我可以接受。如果你的表现让我很满意，说不定我最后真的会帮你逃出科摩罗，猴子。”
languages.original_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: “这样的回答我可以接受。如果你的表现让我很满意，说不定我最后真的会帮你逃出科摩罗，猴子。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Die Antwort ist akzeptabel. Wenn Ihr Euch wie ein braves Versuchsstück benehmt, Chem-Pan-Sey, dann helfe ich Euch vielleicht irgendwann, aus Commorragh zu entkommen."
languages.original_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "Die Antwort ist akzeptabel. Wenn Ihr Euch wie ein braves Versuchsstück benehmt, Chem-Pan-Sey, dann helfe ich Euch vielleicht irgendwann, aus Commorragh zu entkommen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Tu respuesta es válida. Si te empiezas a comportar como un buen espécimen, mon-keigh, puede que te ayude a escapar de Commorragh».
languages.original_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: «Tu respuesta es válida. Si te empiezas a comportar como un buen espécimen, mon-keigh, puede que te ayude a escapar de Commorragh».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「それでいい。良い標本のように振る舞っていれば、いずれコモラフ脱出の手助けしてやれるかもしいれないぞ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: 「それでいい。良い標本のように振る舞っていれば、いずれコモラフ脱出の手助けしてやれるかもしいれないぞ、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Bu yanıt kabul edilebilir. Uslu bir numune olursan mon-keigh, ileride Commorragh'tan kaçmana yardımcı olmam mümkün olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The response is acceptable. If you behave like a good specimen, mon-keigh, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yanıt kabul edilebilir. Uslu bir numune olursan mon-keigh, ileride Commorragh'tan kaçman için yardımcı bile olabilirim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
